text: The women's 800 metres event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 17, 18 and 20 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Nancy Jebet Langat ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Georgie Clarke ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Lucia Klocová ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
